QueryDefinition.Query:
With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}.chunk_person where chunk_id = {0} ), constype AS( select code, text from {sc}.lookup where lookup_type_id = 18 ) select a.patid, a.staffid, a.issueseq, a.eventdate, product.gemscriptcode, round(case when a.qty < 0 then null else a.qty end, 0) qty, concat(a.patid,to_char(a.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(c.constype, 99)) as temp_visit_occurrence_id, nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id, a.consid, d.dosage_text, coalesce(a.numpacks, 0) numpacks, MOD(a.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, coalesce(coalesce(case when a.numdays = 0 or a.numdays > 365 then null else a.numdays end, coalesce(dd.numdays, dm.numdays)), 1) days_supply, constype.text as description, c.constype from ch join {sc}.therapy a on a.patid = ch.person_id join {sc}.consultation c on a.patid = c.patid and a.consid = c.consid left join constype on constype.code = c.constype
left join {sc}.Product product on a.prodcode = product.prodcode left join {sc}.commondosages d on a.dosageid = d.dosageid left join {sc}.daysupply_decodes dd on a.prodcode = dd.prodcode and dd.daily_dose = coalesce(d.daily_dose, 0) and dd.qty = coalesce(case when a.qty < 0 then null else a.qty end, 0) and dd.numpacks = coalesce(a.numpacks, 0) left join {sc}.daysupply_modes dm on a.prodcode = dm.prodcode -- where a.eventdate is not null -- and c.eventdate is not null order by a.patid
